participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and approachable, she enjoys engaging conversations and has a warm sense of humor.
participant_1.background: Emily is a marketing specialist living in a bustling city. She loves exploring new cafes and meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and articulate, he values deep discussions and often thinks outside the box.
participant_2.background: Michael is a software engineer with a passion for technology and innovation. He spends his weekends hiking and reading.
